text:
e="preserve">Jean Cluzel (18 November 1923 – September 2020) was a French politician. He was born in Moulins, Allier, France.
Renowned in the 1980s for his reports about the audiovisual media, he was a member of the Senate between 1971 to 1998. He was a member of the Académie des sciences morales et politiques.
Cluzel died in September 2020, aged 96.
